publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3277 Mr Keith Harding: Levenmouth Drug and Alcohol Project-That the Parliament congratulates the Levenmouth Drug and Alcohol Project in Fife for its much valued services and enthusiastic and dedicated commitment shown by the staff, particularly its work on drug and solvent abuse with younger members of the local community.
S1M-3277 Levenmouth Drug and Alcohol Project (lodged on 10 July 2002) Ms Sandra White*
S1M-3277 Levenmouth Drug and Alcohol Project (lodged on 10 July 2002) Mr Brian Monteith*
S1M-3277 Levenmouth Drug and Alcohol Project (lodged on 10 July 2002) Robin Harper*
S1M-3277 Levenmouth Drug and Alcohol Project (lodged on 10 July 2002) Tricia Marwick*
